com.here.platform.location.referencing

Interface ReferencingLocation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccessPoint, BidirectionalLinearLocation, CircleLocation, ClosedLinearLocation, GeoCoordinateLocation, GridLocation, LinearLocation, PointOfInterest, PolygonLocation, RectangleLocation

    public interface ReferencingLocation
    An abstract location using the Location Library's data model.

    Locations can be anything that includes a geo-spatial component, such as points, lines, roads, sequences of roads or polygons.
